Further, there are gender-and caste-specific aspects to each. An attempt was made to capture the poverty impact at both these levels and also in relation to both gender and caste. | Apart from capturing access to each basic need, an attempt was also made to gauge members' own perceptions on changes in their overall well-being since joining the group."
